title: The Most Exciting PC Hardware in YEARS. - Frore AirJet Cooler
description: Get hooked up with the latest and greatest audio gear at   Get 69% off any of XSplits video tools. Use code LINUS at   It ain't much to look at but Frore System's Airjet cooling inventions could revolutionize PC cooling in the next few years. Here at Computex 2023, they're showing of a new version we've never seen before!
